column1: # ESP32 Partition Table for Shell Project
# This partition table allocates space for:
# - PHY Init Data: WiFi/BT calibration data (required by ESP-IDF)
# - Factory App: The main shell application
# - SPIFFS: Filesystem storage for user files
# NVS partition for storing persistent configuration
# Main application partition - 1.5MB for the shell binary
# SPIFFS filesystem partition - 1MB for user files
# This is where the virtual filesystem will store files
